title: Rick Alistar - Always Gonna Knock Them Up
body:
{{champion:12}}
We're no strangers to LoL.
You have the right runes, and so do I!
An early gank is what I'm wardin' for.
You wouldn't get this from any other bull!
-
I just wanna ping that I'm engagin'.
Gotta help you get boosted!
-
Always gonna knock them up!
Never gonna waste cooldowns.
Always gonna roam around, and ward for you!
Never gonna let you die!
Always gonna say good try!
Never gonna steal a kill, to spite you!
-
We've been in this lane for far too long.
You need to recall, but you're too shy to say it!
Inside we both know I can hold the lane.
We know the game, and we're gonna play it!
-
And if you ask me why I'm staying,
Don't tell me you're too fed to B!
-
Always gonna knock them up!
Never gonna waste cooldowns.
Always gonna roam around, and ward for you!
Never gonna let you die!
Always gonna say good try!
Never gonna steal a kill, to spite you!
-
http://i.imgur.com/PDF3qd8.jpg

replies.body:
As hilarious as this post is, it is 3 years old and the bumping of old content violates the [**Board Universal Rules**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/ITFIpNUE).  I'm going to lock this thread down now so it may be linked for future enjoyment, but will no longer be able to rise beyond the grave.

If anyone has questions about this lock, feel free to reach out to the Moderation Team via:

* The [**NA Boards Discord**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification)
* The [**Discuss the Boards**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) sub-board

{{sticker:poppy-wink}}
Still better than me singing Im a barbey girl in the changing room.
Maybe that'll be my next one? "I'm an Ahri girl! In an Ahri world~! Charming Jaxes, it's fantastic!"
You can't catch me there, I'm dashing everywhere
My Popstar Nation is anime sensation!
